2 Hours Spa Packages Program

The programs from the spa packages that we offer are the best programs and have been proven by the many positive reviews from our customers regarding the spa packages that we provide. First you will do traditional full body massages with a duration of 1 hour carried out by experienced therapists and already know the points of the body that are prone to aches and pains and already know how to apply the right pressure in the massage, followed by doing a foot bath, namely washing your feet and a little massage to make blood circulation in the feet smooth, followed by a body scrub to the body to remove dirt attached to the skin and remove dead skin cells and also to clean clogged pores so that the skin can to be fresh again, followed by doing a flower bath in the bathtub that we have prepared so that all the dirt from the massage and scrub is gone and also to make your body smell like a very fresh flower. Feel the sensation of the 2 hours spa packages that we offer, and it will definitely make you want to do this Bali Spa Packages again
